main.name: Blake Wright
main.description: who has a background in transportation/logistics and sales. I love to think logically and am always looking for creative ways to solve problems. I'm constantly learning new things and trying to improve my ever-growing skill-set. I can't wait to get together and create something amazing. Contact me below!
main.bio: In my free time I'm a casual gamer and I enjoy a very wide variety of games, from FPS to card games. If the weather is nicer than 50 degrees you can find me on the slow-pitch softball field with one of several teams I coach and play for. I am also a proud husband and my wife and I are in love with our miniature golden-doodle, Forrest.
main.contactmessage: Send me any questions or comments!

resume.skillmessage: Some of the technologies I have experience with

projects.title: Athletics Admin (myTeam)
projects.category: myTeam is a permissions based, full stack athletic admin portal. Contact me for demo login!

projects.title: Jeopardy Game
projects.category: A fully functioning single-player Jeopardy game using the Jeopardy API

projects.title: Tech Blog
projects.category: Blog-type full stack website using MVC paradigm, conditional rendering, and user authentication

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.category: A Full Stack Application that allows users to track their fitness accomplishments through the use of a mongo Database, and see results over time with the graph dashboard

projects.title: React Demo
projects.category: My first deployed React app. An exercise in props, state, and JSX

projects.title: Employee Management CLI
projects.category: This is a CLI app with a back end that allows users to perform any CRUD operation on their database of employees

projects.title: Note Taker
projects.category: A Full Stack application to take notes which uses Express and MySQL as a back end

projects.title: E-Commerce Back End
projects.category: This is a back end only application which uses Sequelize to define the relationships between items in an E-commerce shop. You can use this with insomnia or a similar service to reach the API endpoints and get curated data

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: An app to check weather forecast for user-searched cities. Using REST API to fetch data

projects.title: React Portfolio
projects.category: My live professional portfolio on the web using ReactJS

projects.title: Book Search
projects.category: A Full Stack React Application re-factored from REST API into a graphQL API with ApolloServer
